title: Can't Join Games or Create Lobbies
body: So, I've been trying to join a game for over two hours and it won't allow me to create or join lobbies already made. It tells me an error has ocurred when I try to join a game. When I try to start a game the Play button is greyed out and says "We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please restart the client." I've restarted my PC, closed and restarted the client multiple times, force closed the client from task manager.

replies.body: I too am having the same problems. Also before I am able to log in, a message appears saying, "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version". How ever nothing changes and I am given the option to log in.

Riot games has the absolute worst customer support and help in the gaming world. They are one of the biggest games in the world but have worse customer support then EA. How is this is even possible.

This sounds like a network issue that's blocking you from reaching the matchmaking or patching service.  It's likely that other services might be impacted to should you somehow reach them.  My suggestion here would be to start off with the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to remove any blocks and tighten up your connection to our servers.  Restart your PC and let me know if you run into any trouble, though.
Still no luck. Still saying its patching and loading an older launcher version after the patch is through and won't let me play

If you're still having this issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech guys can take a closer look with you.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs and attach them to your ticket for context.  We'll see you there!
Try my method if you have not already. Best of luck!

I was able to fix mine by using the Hextech Repair Tool to Clean Uninstall. However you are completely wiping all League of Legends files from your pc, then reinstalling the game, so it may take a while. Also I am unsure as to how long this will fix the problem, as of right now I have restarted the client a few times and it works perfectly fine.
I'm having the same problem. I'm just hoping there's a reliable fix for this soon.
I have had the same issue, and have tried everthing you guys suggested, still no luck.
